extension.name: Pixabay Grid
extension.author: Maarten Blokdijk
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later
extension.description: Place a pixabay grid, based on user or searchphrase module in a position. By Maarten Blokdijk (info@cloudfaction.nl) Like? Donate on paypal.me/cloudfaction.

field.name: pixabay_apikey
field.label: Api Key
field.description: API Key (required by Pixabay. When logged on you can get this from pixabay)

field.name: pixabay_username
field.label: Username
field.description: Shows images from a specific pixabay user. If empty, search phrase is used.

field.name: pixabay_search
field.label: Searchphrase
field.description: A string to search for. Maximum length: 100 characters. Omit to select all images.

field.name: pixabay_rows
field.label: Rows
field.description: Number of rows to show in your grid

field.name: pixabay_rowheight
field.label: Row height
field.description: Maximum height of a row in pixels. Values 30-180.

field.name: pixabay_perpage
field.label: Items on page
field.description: aximum number of images per next/prev page. Values: 3-100

field.name: pixabay_safesearch
field.label: Safe Search
field.description: Use safe-search or not to filter adult content

field.name: pixabay_order
field.label: Order your grid
field.description: How the results should be ordered. Accepted values: popular, latest.

field.name: pixabay_branding
field.label: Branding
field.description: Show that your grid is powered by Pixabay

field.name: pixabay_prev
field.label: Previous Text
field.description: Text for the previous link. Leave empty to hide pagination controls.

field.name: pixabay_next
field.label: Next Text
field.description: Text for the next link. Leave empty to hide pagination controls.
